subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Second-seeded Ivo Karlovic of Croatia and third-seeded Lleyton Hewitt of Australia advanced to the final of the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships on Saturday in Newport, R.I.
snippet: Second-seeded Ivo Karlovic of Croatia and third-seeded Lleyton Hewitt of Australia advanced to the final of the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships on Saturday in Newport, R.I.
